About

I'm a Frontend Developer from Saint-Petersburg, Russia. I have a passion for JavaScript and coding in general.
While I work mostly with UI, I also enjoy getting involved in back-end development with Node JS.
I build responsive, mobile first websites and cool Single Page Application with React framework. Let's make something special.
